title: What the hell?
content:

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: What the hell?
content: It's from the [url=http://www.somethingawful.com/index.php?a=4319]Anagrammed Video Games[/url] Phriday.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Men end a mocker.
content:
Mend me, or a neck.

End me a cork men!

title: Re: And of course...
content:
Cool, Keen is everywhere! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Thanks for posting those. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: And of course...
content:
What a cop-out. "Redneck Emo-Man" would have been better. :P I bet they used a bot to get that title!
